title: How should I prepare for the International Math Olympiad (IMO) as a beginner in 5 months? - Quora

response.answer_text: YOU MUST FOCUS ON THE FOLLOWING TOPICS TO PREPARE FOR VARIOUS MATHEMATICS OLYMPIADS- 1) Number Theory: Gcd, Lcm, Euclid division algorithm, Modulo arithmetic, divisibility, fermat's theorm, diophantine equations, etc. 2)Algebra: Polynomials, Quadratic equations, root coefficient relationship, maxima and minima, graphical method of solving equations, etc. 3) Combinatorics: Permutation and combination (with repetition problem section) , ball and bar question, sets, graph theory, etc. 4) Inequality: RM-AM-GM-HM inequality, Cauchy- Schwartz inequality, holder's Inequality, etc. 5) Geometry: Solutions of triangle, Ptolemy theorm, ceva's theorem, Menelaus theorm, and other theorm.[Give more time to geometry than other topics]. HOPE THIS WILL HELP YOU.
